message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to me is at least $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice! However, $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $14000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I can sell the product to you for $16000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal on this unique item. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, $16000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that $14500 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell the product to you for $15500. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal on this unique item. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another compromise, Alice! However, $15500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. This is my final offer. Can you consider it?
